body_html:
Its working perfect.
But should we install again all packages like cv2, matplotlib etc.
Because spyder(tensorflow) shows the below error.

runfile('C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs/maskplot.py', wdir='C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs')
Traceback (most recent call last):

File "", line 1, in
runfile('C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs/maskplot.py', wdir='C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs')

File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\spyder\utils\site\sitecustomize.py", line 688, in runfile
execfile(filename, namespace)

File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\spyder\utils\site\sitecustomize.py", line 101, in execfile
exec(compile(f.read(), filename, 'exec'), namespace)

File "C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs/maskplot.py", line 1, in
import cv2

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'cv2'

body:
Its working perfect.
But should we install again all packages like cv2, matplotlib etc.
Because spyder(tensorflow) shows the below error.

runfile('C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs/maskplot.py', wdir='C:/Anaconda3/Scripts/programs')
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-1-fa20f58c72ab>", line 1, in <module>

  File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\tensorflow\lib\site-packages\spyder\utils\site\sitecustomize.py", line 688, in runfile
    execfile(filename, namespace)
